item.title: Farzan add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "More than any other time in history, mankind faces a crossroads. One path leads to despair and utter hopelessness. The other, to total extinction. Let us pray we have the wisdom to choose correctly." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Peter Stone
item.description: "In my many years I have come to a conclusion that one useless man is a shame, two is a law firm, and three or more is a congress." -- Peter Stone

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Without suffering, there'd be no compassion." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I finally understood what true love meant...love meant that you care for another person's happiness more than your own, no matter how painful the choices you face might be." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "If I had a view like this to look down on every day, I would have the energy and inspiration to conquer the world. The trouble is, when you most need such a view, no one gives it to you." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Rachel Gibson
item.description: "Because sometimes in life Ken doesn't always choose Barbie." -- Rachel Gibson

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "من نميگويم هرگز نبايد در نگاه اول عاشق شد اما اعتقاد دارم بايد براي بار دوم هم نگاه کرد" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Doris May Lessing
item.description: "There is no doubt fiction makes a better job of the truth." -- Doris May Lessing

item.title: Farzan add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "If a thing loves, it is infinite." -- William Blake

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Farzan add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Maybe ever’body in the whole damn world is scared of each other." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description: "I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "They didn’t agree on much. In fact, they didn’t agree on anything. They fought all the time and challenged each other ever day. But despite their differences, they had one important thing in common. They were crazy about each other." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Farzan add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "Do not be afraid; our fate Cannot be taken from us; it is a gift." -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: Farzan add a quote by صادق هدایت
item.description: "تقلید عیب نیست، دزدی و چاپیدن عیب است" -- صادق هدایت
